Reads a byte from a stream

Reads a byte from the stream, adding it to info_bytes if necessary.

Sends a GET request to the tracker.

Indicates that bytes downloaded and uploaded should be set to zero.

Resets bytes downloaded/uploaded There is a functional delay to avoid threading issues

A decoder to torrent response streams.

Creates a ResponseDecoder object, and parses torrent response.

Starts listening, continues until done = true after calling stop()
run() - Method in class connection.PeerSocket
Called by thread Handshakes and then downloads/uploads
run() - Method in class main.RUBTClient
Code for a thread which, every 30 seconds, chokes the worse peer and unchokes a random peer.
